title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.80 - Food preparation and service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.80 - Food preparation and service

State Regulations
(a) Food is to be prepared and served with no bare hand contact unless the food will be subsequenty heated to at least the minimum temperature required under section
14-1.82
of this Subpart or to 165 degrees Fahrenheit (73.9 degrees Celsius) or greater for foods that are being heated for a second or subsequent time. (b) Convenient and suitable utensils and/or sanitary gloves are to be provided and used to prepare or serve food to eliminate bare hand contact and prevent contamination. Waxed paper, napkins or equivalent barrier to prevent hand contact can also be used to serve food. Notes
